H0.text: Chemical state of the solute is the factor upon which the majority of solution properties depend.

H1.text: Similar state of solute is what the majority of solution properties depend upon.

H2.text: The gas state of solute is what the majority of solution properties depend upon.

H3.text: Acid state of solute is what the majority of solution properties depend upon.

A4.text: Polar solutes dissolve in polar solvents, forming polar bonds or hydrogen bonds.

A5.text: Non-polar solutes dissolve better in non-polar solvents.
